name: interface

scripts.setup: npm init -y && npm install vite @sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte svelte @tauri-apps/api @tauri-apps/cli @tauri-apps/plugin-dialog chart.js leaflet && npm set-script dev 'vite' && npm set-script build 'vite build' && npm set-script tauri 'tauri' && npm run tauri add dialog

description: Run to download dependences: ```bash npm  run setup ``` Open tauri app in dev mode: ```bash npm run tauri dev ```
